GameDBLocalizedString.Text: Hold [M] to adjust offset of selected object
[LMB] Select a target [RMB or ESC] Cancel
Switch the alliance status between these players: Hostile, Neutral, Allies
Map has no players with at least one commander or base
Mark area as gameplay objects only
Show/hide removable objects, commanders and armies
Show/hide patricles and vfx on objects
Show/hide editor indicators of particles, vfx and events
Allow selection of removable objects, commanders and armies
Affects objects and neutral armies. Don't remove armies from events on tiles guarded by the army itself!
Invisible point on the map that uncovers a circular area in the fog of war for its owner. Configurable range.
Go to event triggers in object catalog
Commit drawn objects when switching brushes
Note: If you updated the name or description on Steam, this will overwrite them!
Gameplay area is used to sketch out map layout and blocks placement of non-interactive objects.\nTo edit it, mark tiles on the map with the brush.
Custom areas can be used to permanently cover an area in fog of war or to control AI commanders. Accessible from map events.
